Given its exceptional value and unique features, we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable item to you at a special introductory price of $800,000. We are confident that you will find this proposal compelling and hope to have the privilege of serving you soon. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer
